version_description:
MAJOR UPDATE
- New Map: Hangar Map with New York Theme!
- Free Card Game to earn guaranteed Dragon skin and other rewards!
- Victory Pose to show off your skills!
- Map lighting quality improvements!
- Complete UI visual change!
- New Splash Screen and Critical Strike Logo!
* We are ready to make your game experience even better! Enjoy it!
* Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make game better.

MAJOR CONTENT UPDATE!
- New Game Mode: Bomb Defuse!
- New Counter and Terrorist Characters!
- Reworked Map: Pool Party!
- New Weapon Skins!

* We are ready to make your game experience even better! Enjoy it!
* Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make game better.

MAJOR CONTENT UPDATE!
- New Game Mode: Bomb Defuse!
- New Counter and Terrorist Characters!
- Reworked Map: Pool Party!
- New Weapon Skins!

* We are ready to make your game experience even better! Enjoy it!
* Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make game better.

- New gameplay improvements: an even smoother experience than before
- New In-Game UI's
- New bonus content: Free Bronze spin at the game end
- New weapons skins
- New swipe mechanism added for Arsenal
- New improved performance and stability
- New improved anti-cheat system
- Many Bug fixes
- We've got even more UI's coming just around the corner

MAJOR CONTENT UPDATE!
*Halloween skins are available!
New gameplay improvement and in-Game UI's: an even smoother experience than before
New bonus content: Free Bronze spin
New weapons skins
New swipe mechanism added for Arsenal
New improved performance and stability
New improved anti-cheat system

We are ready to make your game experience even better! Enjoy it!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make game better.

MAJOR UPDATE
Brand new UI style
New map: CHERNOBYL
Killer Chest reward for each 100 kills!
New Daily Missions and Rewards
Major fixes on Defuse Mode
Major fixes on Friend System
New improved performance and stability
Blood Effect

We are ready to make your game experience even better! Enjoy it!
Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make game better.
